name: ConferenceMATRIX
tag_list: conference, tradeshow, meeting, seminars, congress, exposition
overview:
ConferenceMATRIX is a free, ad supported online directory of upcoming CONFERENCES, TRADESHOWS and BUSINESS EVENTS across all industries and all geographies.

ConferenceMATRIX is part vertical search engine and part online directory service which sources, organizes and adds value to listings. It targets conference attendees and is designed as an easy to use first stop portal that allows users to â€œsearchâ€, â€œsortâ€ and â€œsaveâ€ specific conferences, as well as click through for more information and ultimate registration. It is a Web 2.0 business driven by advertising and a host of additional revenue streams.

ConferenceMATRIX.com was launched in 2006 by three successful New York entreprenuers representing online directory publishing, Internet advertising / technology and B2B conferences.
